name: 13 Days with the Zombs
description:
Work In Progress

"13 Days with the Zombs" is a zombie survival game made for the Godot Wild Game Jam. where you have to fend off zombies as they're coming into your cabin. Use your arsenal of weapons to survive!

RC4 (release candidate 4) is the final version of the game submitted for the Godot Wild Game Jam. Other earlier versions are available to play and download as well.

CONTROLS:
WASD to move
R to reload
Mouse to fire

Num Keys to select weapon:

  1. Assault Rifle
  2. Grenade Launcher (doesn't work)
  3. Machine Gun
  4. Pistol
  5. RPG
  6. Shotgun
  7. SMG
  8. Sniper

CREDITS:

  • Art by Kylin (GucciSushi)
  • Music by Sean (Conner42)
  • Programming by Jake (ZekTheSnek)
